topic.title: Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation - conformance rules

section.p: An explanation of why efforts to conduct a procedure were abandoned

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11522 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.130"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11255)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 ActCode) (CONF:10511)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10514), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResuscitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16 (Reason CPR/resuscitation discontinued)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11255)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 ActCode) (CONF:10511)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10514), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResuscitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16 (Reason CPR/resuscitation discontinued)

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.130" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" displayName="Assertion"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
